title: TexAmericas Center Awarded Distinguished Budget Presentation Award by the Government Finance Officers Association | Texarkana Today - TXK Today
content: TexAmericas Center Awarded Distinguished Budget Presentation Award by the Government Finance Officers Association | Texarkana Today  TXK Today
description: TexAmericas Center (TAC) announced its budget for the 2022 fiscal year has been awarded the Distinguished Budget Presentation Award by the Government Finance Officers Association. The award represents a significant achievement by the organization and reflects a commitment of the governing body and staff to meeting the highest principles of governmental budgeting. “TexAmericas Center strives […]
